ficus.name: Ficus
ficus.care: Bright indirect light. Water every 7-10 days. Trim dry leaves.

aloe.name: Aloe Vera
aloe.care: Bright light. Water every 2-3 weeks. Use well-draining soil.

monstera.name: Monstera
monstera.care: Indirect bright light. Water weekly. Provide support for aerial roots.

rose.name: Rose
rose.care: Full sun. Water regularly. Prune after flowering.

basil.name: Basil
basil.care: Full sun. Keep soil moist. Harvest leaves often.

lavender.name: Lavandula
lavender.care: Full sun. Well-draining soil. Water sparingly.

snake.name: Snake Plant
snake.care: Low to bright light. Water every 2â€“3 weeks.

pothos.name: Pothos
pothos.care: Low to medium light. Water when topsoil dries.

sunflower.name: Sunflower
sunflower.care: Full sun. Regular watering and support for stems.

orchid.name: Orchid
orchid.care: Bright, indirect light. Special potting mix; moderate watering.
